And this even happens in the launcher
Make sure your driver is up to date please covername, and try toggling anti-aliasing, it seems there's a problem with it.
I have the latest drivers and there is no way to toggle AA or any graphics settings.

In the main menu there is an option called Settings, this opens the settings screen where you will find the graphics page.

You will find anti-aliasing settings there, they are on 2x by default and can be disabled.

I've disabled AA and still have the same problem.

Nvidia 640GT, driver 331.113.

Edit: This is how the space center looks with AA disabled both in game and driver settings (I've got there by random clicks):

Edit 2: Somehow it was fixed by a reboot, but thanks anyway.
